summary: The University of Florida (UF) is a large public research university in Gainesville, Florida. It was founded in 1853 and has been at its current location since 1906. UF is one of the top universities in the state and is known for its research. It has 16 colleges and offers many graduate programs. The university is also famous for its sports teams, the Florida Gators, who compete in the NCAA Division I. As of 2021, UF students and alumni have won 143 Olympic medals.
title: University of Florida
